Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Inspired by Excellence and Innovation, ASA Institute of Higher Education offers the highest quality teaching and learning. ASA Institute of Higher Education provides innovative, industry and future-focused courses so that ASA graduates are ready to step into leadership roles in a challenging, technologically advanced and disruptive business world. Our flexible and innovative approach to learning and development, which aligns with future directions and industry needs, will equip graduates with the professional knowledge and skills required to ensure they are the preferred choice of employers.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Student Information:

Enrollment records
Academic transcripts
Attendance records
Student profiles and demographics
Learning Management System (LMS) Data:

Course materials (videos, readings, quizzes, etc.)
Assignment submissions
Grading and feedback
Online classroom recordings
Administrative Data:

Faculty and staff information
Payroll and HR records
Institutional policies and documents
Financial and billing data
Admissions and Applications Data:

Application forms
Supporting documents (e.g., transcripts, test scores)
Communication records with applicants
Compliance and Regulatory Data:

Accreditation documents
Data for government reporting (e.g., financial aid, international student visas)

Analytics and Research Data:

Student performance metrics
Research data from faculty or students
Usage statistics from online resources
